person.note: Yang(2) Rong [28347] He changed his mingzi from Zirong (子榮) to Rong. CHECK nianpu. MS, 148.4138-4142. Jianning FZ (1539), 15.90b, 15.40a-42a.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1399: juren degree (Yi jing #1).
